  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:colos_sl/130195</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:colos_sl/130195</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Transformacija kinetične energije v potencialno</string>
            <string language="en">Transformation of kinetic to potential energy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Transformation von kinetischem zur möglichen 
Energie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Transformation de cinétique à l'énergie 
potentielle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Transformação de cinético à energia 
potencial</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Trasformazione di cinetico ad energia potenziale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μετασχηματισμός της κινητικής έως πιθανής ενέργειας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Transformación de cinético a la energía 
potencial</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Ravninsko nihalo podaljšamo z dodatnim nihalom in spremljamo dogajanje.</string>
            <string language="en">Planar pendulum with additional pendulum joined together to form pendulum system. Observation of energy transformation in such system.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">ravninsko nihalo</string>
            <string language="en">planar pendulum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">sistem nihal</string>
            <string language="en">pendulum system</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">kinetična energija</string>
            <string language="en">kinetic energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">colos</string>
            <string language="en">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">mehanika</string>
            <string language="en">mechanics</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Planares Pendel mit zusätzlichem Pendel verband 
zusammen zum Formularpendelsystem. Beobachtung der 
Energietransformation in solchem System.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le pendule planaire avec le pendule 
supplémentaire s'est joint ensemble au système de pendule de forme. 
Observation de transformation d'énergie dans un tel système.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O pêndulo planar com pêndulo adicional juntou 
junto ao sistema do pêndulo do formulário. Observação da 
transformação da energia em tal sistema.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il pendolo planare con il pendolo supplementare 
si è unito insieme al sistema del pendolo della forma. 
Osservazione di trasformazione di energia in tale sistema.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το επίπεδο εκκρεμές με το πρόσθετο εκκρεμές ένωσε 
μαζί για να διαμορφώσει το σύστημα εκκρεμών. Παρατήρηση του
ενεργειακού μετασχηματισμού σε τέτοιο σύστημα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El péndulo planar con el péndulo adicional 
ensambló junto al sistema del péndulo de la forma. 
Observación de la transformación de la energía en tal 
sistema.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">planares Pendel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Pendelsystem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kinetische Energie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mechaniker</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pendule planaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">système de pendule</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">énergie cinétique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mécanique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">pêndulo planar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sistema do pêndulo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">energia cinética</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sistema del pendolo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">energia cinetica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">meccanici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">επίπεδο εκκρεμές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σύστημα εκκρεμών</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
